# Load data

#Extract pvalue, gene symbol and logfc

# Volcano analysis
```{r}
# Transform p value to -log10
GSE33532_edited$lgtranspvalue <- -log10(GSE33532_edited$P.Value)
head(GSE33532_edited)

# Set the volcano plot parameter
par(pch = 16) # solid dot
par(pty = "s") # square plot

# Plotting the figures
plot(GSE33532_edited$logFC, GSE33532_edited$lgtranspvalue, main='\n Diffrentially expressed Gene Analysis: GSE33532\n Tumor (n = 80) vs Control (n = 20)\n -log10(p-value) > 2 & |log2FC| > 1\n', xlab=expression('lg'[2]*'FC'), ylab=expression('-lg'[10]*'pvalue'),cex.lab=1.2)

# For down-regulated genes
# logFC < 0 because any numbers cannot divided by 0
# 2/-logFC; the "2" here refers to p-value = 0.01
with(subset(GSE33532_edited, logFC < 0 & lgtranspvalue >= (2/-logFC)), points(logFC, lgtranspvalue, col = "red"))

# For up-regulated genes
with(subset(GSE33532_edited, logFC > 0 & lgtranspvalue >= (2/logFC)), points(logFC, lgtranspvalue, col = "blue"))

# Draw the line
xpos <- seq(0, 6, 0.01)
xneg <- seq(-6, 0, 0.01)
points(xpos, 2/xpos, type="l")
points(xneg, -2/xneg, type="l")
```
# Down-regulated genes
```{r}
# Extract Down-regulated genes
GSE_DOWN <- subset(GSE33532_edited, logFC < 0 & lgtranspvalue >= (2/-logFC) , select = c(Updated.gene.symbol, logFC, P.Value))
GSE_DOWN <- GSE_DOWN[order(GSE_DOWN$logFC), ]
head(GSE_DOWN)

write.table(GSE_DOWN, "~/GeneExpressionAnalysis/Output/Lung Cancer/Malignant/GSE33532/GSE33532_DN.tsv", quote = FALSE, sep = '\t', row.names = FALSE)
```
# Up-regulated genes
```{r}
# Extract Up-regulated genes
GSE_UP <- subset(GSE33532_edited, logFC > 0 & lgtranspvalue >= (2/logFC) , select = c(Updated.gene.symbol, logFC, P.Value))
GSE_UP <- GSE_UP[order(GSE_UP$logFC, decreasing = TRUE), ]
head(GSE_UP)

write.table(GSE_UP, "~/GeneExpressionAnalysis/Output/Lung Cancer/Malignant/GSE33532/GSE33532_UP.tsv", quote = FALSE, sep = '\t', row.names = FALSE)
```
